description: Meta-plan to review common-repo against open source best practices and create sub-plans for improvements
session_startup: Run git status to check branch
Read this file to find current task
Find first task where status=pending and blocked_by=null

tasks.name: Research documentation best practices
steps: Web search for OSS documentation best practices (2024-2025)
Examine docs structure of uv, ruff, ripgrep, starship, tokio
Note: README patterns, docs site structure, API docs, examples
Document findings in context/research/documentation-practices.md
acceptance_criteria: Research file exists with findings from 5+ projects
Includes specific examples and links

tasks.name: Research testing best practices
steps: Web search for Rust testing best practices, OSS testing strategies
Examine test structure of uv, ripgrep, serde, axum
Note: Coverage targets, test organization, fixtures, CI integration
Document findings in context/research/testing-practices.md
acceptance_criteria: Research file exists with findings from 5+ projects
Includes coverage strategies, test patterns

tasks.name: Research CI/CD best practices
steps: Web search for GitHub Actions best practices, Rust CI patterns
Examine CI workflows of uv, ruff, ripgrep, deno
Note: Job structure, caching, release automation, matrix builds
Document findings in context/research/cicd-practices.md
acceptance_criteria: Research file exists with workflow patterns
Includes release automation strategies

tasks.name: Research code architecture best practices

acceptance_criteria: Research file exists with architectural patterns
Includes module organization examples

tasks.name: Research CLI/UX best practices

tasks.name: Compile research into reference document
steps: Read all research files in context/research/
Synthesize into context/research/best-practices-reference.md
Organize by area with key takeaways and exemplar projects
acceptance_criteria: Reference document exists
Covers all 9 areas with actionable insights

tasks.name: Create evaluation checklist

Create context/evaluation-checklist.md with scorable criteria
Organize by area with pass/fail/partial indicators
acceptance_criteria: Checklist exists with clear criteria
Each area has 5-10 checkable items
